markdown:
<title level="1" right="Action">[Raise Neck](/Actions.aspx?ID=1450) <actions string="Single Action" /></title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 48</row>

</column>

---

You raise your head into a striking position. The fangs Strike granted by your nagaji ancestry gains a [reach](/Traits.aspx?ID=192) of 10 feet until the end of your turn.
name: Raise Neck
